content.en: Algorithm animation: Researchers have explored various methodologies and software environments for animating algorithms. These include using Microsoft Excel, Polka-RC, Eliot, Algorithma 98, the University of Geneva, ANIM, PASTIS, Animus, ANIMENGINE, Leonardo, Catai, ANIMAL, and Jeliot. These tools and systems allow for the automation and visualization of algorithms, making them more accessible and easier to understand.
content.da: Algoritmeanimation: Forskere har udforsket forskellige metoder og softwaremiljøer til animation af algoritmer. Disse inkluderer brug af Microsoft Excel, Polka-RC, Eliot, Algorithma 98, University of Geneva, ANIM, PASTIS, Animus, ANIMENGINE, Leonardo, Catai, ANIMAL og Jeliot. Disse værktøjer og systemer muliggør automatisering og visualisering af algoritmer, hvilket gør dem mere tilgængelige og lettere at forstå.
